title: Mapped Out, Ep. 6: How It Might Go
description: In Wisconsin, it's the job of the Legislature and the governor to handle redistricting every decade, and pretty much no one thinks they're actually going to do it this time around. With split control of state government, things are likely headed to court, but which court and when are still open questions.
author: web-team@wpr.org (Wisconsin Public Radio)
